## Remarks 使用已配置的 以声明方式请求访问检查。The is used to declaratively request an access check using the configured . 您必须指定一个 值、一个 `Resource` 和 声明中的 `Operation`。You must specify one of the values, a `Resource` and an `Operation` in your declaration. `Resource` 和 `Operation` 属性指定了必须授权当前主体（）执行以继续执行的资源和操作。The `Resource` and `Operation` properties specify the resource and action for which the current principal () must be authorized for execution to proceed. 如果当前主体无权对指定的资源执行指定的操作（操作），则会引发 。If the current principal is not authorized to perform the specified action (operation) on the specified resource, a is thrown. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类使用由 属性下设置的 配置的声明授权管理器。The class uses the claims authorization manager configured by the that is set under the property. 即使在不使用 WS-FEDERATION 的情况下，也是如此，例如，活动（WCF） Web 应用程序和控制台应用程序。This is true in all cases, even in scenarios where WS-Federation is not used; for example, active (WCF) Web applications and Console applications. 可以在配置中或以编程方式指定声明授权管理器。You can specify the claims authorization manager either in configuration or programmatically. 若要在配置文件中指定声明授权管理器，请在[<identityConfiguration>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration)元素下设置[<claimsAuthorizationManager>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager)元素，并确保此标识配置由运行时加载的[<federationConfiguration>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration)元素引用（例如，通过设置 `identityConfigurationName` 特性）。To specify the claims authorization manager in a configuration file, set the [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager) element under an [<identityConfiguration>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration) element and ensure that this identity configuration is referenced by the [<federationConfiguration>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration) element that is loaded by the runtime (for example, by setting the `identityConfigurationName` attribute). 若要以编程方式设置声明授权管理器，请为 事件提供处理程序。To set the claims authorization manager programmatically, provide a handler for the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过使用 特性来修饰方法，从而保护方法。The following example shows how to protect a method by decorating it with the attribute. 特性通过利用应用程序上下文中的 实例提供的逻辑来评估是否应向当前主体授予访问权限。The attribute will evaluate whether access should be granted to the current principal by leveraging the logic provided by the instance in the application context. 如果未对指定资源的指定操作授权当前主体，则会引发 ;否则，执行将继续。If the current principal is not authorized for the specified action on the specified resource, a is thrown; otherwise, execution proceeds. [!code-csharp[WifCppWithCam#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcppwithcam/cs/wifcppwithcam/program.cs#4)] 下面的 XML 演示将自定义声明授权管理器与 类结合使用所需的最低配置。The following XML shows the minimum configuration required to use a custom claims authorization manager with the class. 至少必须在 `` 元素中同时声明 `system.identityModel` 和 `system.identityModel.services` 部分，然后在默认标识配置下的[<claimsAuthorizationManager>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager)元素中指定授权管理器。You must, at a minimum, declare both the `system.identityModel` and the `system.identityModel.services` sections in the `` element and then specify your authorization manager in a [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager) element under the default identity configuration. 这将确保从默认的联合身份验证配置引用授权管理器。This will ensure that your authorization manager is referenced from the default federation configuration. 或者，您可以指定在[<federationConfiguration>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration)元素的 `identityConfigurationName` 属性中指定授权管理器的标识配置的名称。Alternatively, you can specify the name of the identity configuration under which your authorization manager is specified in the `identityConfigurationName` attribute of the [<federationConfiguration>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/federationconfiguration) element. ```xml
